pkmkdoc.description:
Growl is a centralized notification system for OS X.
It allows compatible applications to provide you with information in an attractive and customizable way without you having to switch away from what you are currently doing.
See http://growl.info/about.php for more information.

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Welcome to Growl! \ \ Growl is a centralized notification system for OS X. \ \ It allows applications that support it to provide you with information in an attractive and customizable way without you having to switch away from what you are currently doing.\ \ Some applications can have Growl support added using plugins or 'extras'. You can find extras for Safari, Apple Mail, and more in the Extras folder which came with this installer.\ \ See http://growl.info/about.php for more information.\ \ Click Continue to install.\ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038 {\fonttbl\f0\fswiss\fcharset0 Helvetica;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural
\f0\fs24 \cf0 Welkom bij Growl!\ \ Growl is een centraal meldingssysteem voor OS X. \'a0\ \ Programma's die het ondersteunen, kunnen u hiermee voorzien van informatie op een prettige en aanpasbare manier, zonder dat u hoeft te schakelen van wat u op dat moment aan het doen bent.\ \ Sommige programma's kunnen ondersteuning hebben voor Growl met plugins of "extra's". U kunt "extra's" vinden voor Safari, Apple Mail en meer in de map Extras die bij dit installatieprogramma zat.\ \ Zie http://growl.info/about.php voor meer informatie.\ \ Druk op Ga door om te installeren.\ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 V\'e4lkommen till Growl! \ \ Growl \'e4r ett centraliserat meddelandesystem for OS X. \ \ Growl ger applikationer m\'f6jlighet att tillhandah\'e5lla information p\'e5 ett enkelt, snyggt och anpassningsbart s\'e4tt.\ \ Vissa program kan f\'e5 st\'f6d f\'f6r Growl genom hj\'e4lpprogram, s\'e5 kallade "extras". Du hittar hj\'e4lpprogram f\'f6r Safari, Apple Mail och diverse andra program i katalogen Extras, som f\'f6ljde med detta installationsprogram.\ \ Bes\'f6k g\'e4rna http://growl.info/about.php f\'f6r mer information.\ \ Klicka Forts\'e4tt f\'f6r att installera.\ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Bem vindos ao Growl! \ \ O Growl \'e9 um sistema de notifica\'e7\'f5es centralizadas para o OS X. \ \ Sendo assim, os aplicativos passam a poder lhe enviar informa\'e7\'f5es de uma forma atrativa e tamb\'e9m customizada, e isso tudo sem que voc\'ea tenha que parar de fazer aquilo que est\'e1 fazendo no atual momento.\ \ Alguns aplicativos tem suporte ao Growl atrav\'e9s do uso de extens\'f5es ou 'extras'. Voc\'ea pode encontrar extras para o Safari, Mail da Apple, e muitos outros na pasta Extras desse instalador.\ \ Para maiores informa\'e7\'f5es, veja a p\'e1gina http://growl.info/about.php (em ingl\'eas)\ \ Clique em Continuar para iniciar a instala\'e7\'e3o. \ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Bienvenue \'e0 Growl ! \ \ Growl est un syst\'e8me de notification centralis\'e9e pour Mac OS X. \ \ Il permet aux applications qui le reconnaissent de fournir de l\'92information de mani\'e8re attrayante et personnalisable sans devoir abandonner ce qu\'92on est en train de faire.\ \ Certaines applications peuvent avoir du support de Growl en plus avec des modules ou 'extras'. Il y a des suppl\'e9ments pour Safari, Apple Mail et autres dans le dossier Extras qui est fourni avec cet installeur.\ \ Voir <http://growl.info/about.php> pour plus d\'92information.\ \ Cliquer sur Continuer pour installer.\ }
